DirectoryArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that is associated with the Directory in which the object will be created. For more information, see arns.

LinkName.description: The name of link that is used to attach this object to a parent.

ObjectAttributeList.description: The attribute map whose attribute ARN contains the key and attribute value as the map value.

ParentReference.description: If specified, the parent reference to which this object will be attached.

SchemaFacets.description: A list of schema facets to be associated with the object that contains SchemaArn and facet name. For more information, see arns.
